6.2.19  12:22 am   Hello. I am aware that people often ask you why you never use capital letters, as if a lack of them delegitimizes anything you write. Then you sometimes link to your enormous "capital letters report". I am not here to inspire you to do that. Instead I shall ask you this: perhaps the way you use capital letters is a bit unconventional,

      so what do you think is the best way to use them?

5.31.19  2:19 pm   i feel like if you collaborated with Jon Bois, the two of you would rise way beyond everything else -- consistently. his sensibilities are so very similar to yours, even though you both bring tons of unique ideas to the table. your content feels like his content's brother. i can't stress this enough -- please find a way to work with Jon Bois on SOMETHING
